mapper.select: select (select curr_date from ttrd_currdate) as 创建日期ITEM, i.i_name as 机构名称ITEM, tr_type.description as 业务种类ITEM, tr.ord_id as 审批单号ITEM, ii.CORE_SYS_CUSTOMER_CODE as 客户号ITEM, ii.i_fullname as 客户全称ITEM, tr.bnd_settype as 结算方式ITEM, right.p_i_code as 票据代码ITEM, instrument.i_name as 票据名称ITEM, tr.a_type as 票据性质ITEM, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount/ 10000 as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 券面总额ITEM, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordcount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 票据面额ITEM, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_netprice as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 净价金额ITEM, tr.bnd_ytm * 100 as 到期收益率ITEM, tr.setdate as 结算日期ITEM, tr.orddate as 交易日期ITEM, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.ordamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 结算金额ITEM, TRIM(to_char(cast(tr.bnd_aiamount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.99')) as 总应计利息ITEM, tr.operator as 执行人ITEM, tr.trader as 交易确认人ITEM, 'T+' || to_char(tr.setdays) 清算速度ITEM, tr.intordid as 成交单编号ITEM, secu.accname as 内部证券账户ITEM, cash_ext.accname as 资金账户ITEM, tr.trader as 交易员ITEM, TRIM(to_char(cast(right.amount as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 票据面额ITEM, right.discount as 折价率ITEM, TRIM(to_char(cast(right.amount*(right.discount/100) as decimal(31,6)),'999,999,999,990.9999')) as 折价金额ITEM FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE tr left join ttrd_pledgebond right on tr.i_code = right.i_code LEFT JOIN ttrd_auth_user u on tr.operator_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN TTRD_INSTITUTION i ON u.i_id = TO_CHAR(i.i_id) left join ttrd_institution ii on tr.partyid = ii.i_id LEFT JOIN ttrd_trade_type tr_type on tr.trdtype = tr_type.trd_type LEFT JOIN TTRD_ACC_SECU secu on tr.secu_accid = secu.accid LEFT JOIN TTRD_ACC_CASH_EXT cash_ext on tr.cash_ext_accid = cash_ext.accid left join ttrd_instrument instrument on right.p_i_code=instrument.i_code where tr.ord_id = (select distinct trr.ord_id FROM TTRD_OTC_TRADE trr where trr.sysordid = #{sysOrdId}) and tr.ref_sysordid is null and tr.ordstatus<0
